TopicTitle: A modding newb's first step to being a modding not-newb.

Articles.Content:
I got the idea from one of my random thoughts, and made it into my first mod. Very alpha, very useless right now.

Heres the thread for it: The Unobtanium Mod

I posted here to spread to word so hopefully some more people would see and be able to give me a hand, some tips or maybe even some support (support as in: "Good work!") and I hope you all like the looks of the 'foundations' of it, as this is my first time ever doing anything like this, in any game, EVER!

Thank you.
